description:
Summary:

When trying to run path tracker service, the app just crashes throwing null pointer exception.

Steps to reproduce:

From Dashboard, just click Path Tracker

Expected behavior:

The app should show the tracked paths and allow the user to track his path.

Observed behavior:

App crash.

Device and Android version:

Device: Samsung and 6.1.0
name: Mifos Android Client - Bug Fix: App crashes on clicking path tracker
